Elation of Fortune

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite: 11th level, ardent, Mantle of Elation class feature
Benefit: Whenever an ally within the radius of your Mantle of Elation makes a save, he or she gains a +1 bonus to attack rolls until the end of his or her next turn.

Published in Player's Handbook 3, page(s) 187.
